story:
Story of My Book

My book, Beyond Creativity, explores the intersection of creativity and curiosity and what they mean for creatives in the 21st century.

My name is Vy-Anh Nguyen and I am the author of Beyond Creativity. I wrote this book because I realized what was missing from my education before attending VCU and want to look into the role that creativity plays in our lives. I will be sharing my personal story, as well as others’ stories, in regards to their creative pursuits apart from their professional/classroom setting.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to live a life full of creativity without boundaries. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for creative living in you. And then, ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool that will inspire your own creative endeavors.

In this book, you'll learn about stories from individuals and companies that use curiosity as a platform for their creativity and have built businesses by initially exploring an industry that was unknown to them. You'll learn:

  • How to pursue a life of creative freedom
  • How you can use your experience to help/connect people
  • How to change your mindset

You will love this book if you are interested in learning about how other people are using creativity to impact the lives of others and/or curiousity to inspire their own passion projects.

Beyond Creativity is a non-fiction book that speaks to students and educators who are looking to bring more creativity into classrooms or their everyday lives.

The Book - Beyond Creativity

The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1 contains the introduction + 5 additional chapters. These chapters will include the history of America’s schools, the creativity crisis, and how education has evolved over time. It will also include stories from current students and a professional in change management whose primary interest is bringing to light what schools aren’t teaching.

Part 2 contains Chapters 6-10. This portion will dive into personal stories from students and an established artist who has gone from being rejected from galleries to having his work featured at the Torpedo factory, including a story from a current business student who is working on a styling app to better improve the lives of middle/high school students.

Part 3 contains Chapters 11-15. This section will teach you how to find your creative path and change the way you approach your work in order to keep motivated. It will also include stories from different individuals who have taken a leap of faith and left their corporate jobs to follow a life that involves pushing others to find their passion and purpose.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

When I publish, you will receive the following:
  • A personally signed copy of my book
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • Access to a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

Vy-Anh Nguyen is a VCU Alum, Copywriting Intern at McCann Worldgroup and a Multicultural Advertising Internship Program (MAIP) 2020 Fellow. MAIP is a talent development program dedicated to diverse young professionals in advertising. 


Over the last couple of years, I’ve come to meet so many students who have unique outlets for their creativity, mostly outside of the classroom setting, and I wanted to explore their creative process and journey with their creative identity.

I’m a published poet and self-taught film/digital photographer.

For more information you can connect with Vy-Anh at dearvyanh@gmail.com and @vyanh.nguyen on Instagram.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #BeyondCreativity and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Vy-Anh Nguyen

story:
Final Goal Met!

Thanks to all the awesome backers who made this our #1 campaign!

Print-a-Mech perk confirmed for Combat Frame Ƶ XSeed!

 

New Stretch Goal: Print-a-Mech!

You wanted it, now you can fund it! I will commission mesh files of the 3 most popular CFs our backers choose & offer them as perks when we hit $10K. 

These files will enable you to 3D print 28-50mm models of your favorite combat frames! DIY or outsource the print job to a convenient online service. 

Unlock your chance to Print a Mech! Back the campaign now!

 

We smashed Stretch Goal 5! You can now claim your place in the Combat Frame XSeed: Pocket War playtest!

Seats are limited, so claim yours in the perks now!

 

Stretch Goal 4 crushed! The Combat Frame XSeed Roleplaying game is now available as a perk. Reserve your copy now ...

... because you'll be stoked for our 5th stretch goal: the Combat Frame XSeed: Pocket War card game beta! 

Test pilot slots open when we hit 700%. Back the campaign now!

 

Announcing Stretch Goal 4: The Combat Frame XSeed Roleplaying Game!

Getting us to 500% funding secures my pledge to release the official Combat Frame XSeed RPG rule book. I will further give our backers 1st dibs by offering the RPG as a perk for this campaign.

Experience the thrill of piloting an XSeed on a CF team with your friends. Back the campaign & unlock the RPG today!

 

Combat Frame XSeed: Classified Intel is now available as a perk!

One convenient perk gets you every XSeed short story in 1 hot volume in both print & digital formats. Claim yours now!

 

New perk added: The fan favorite CF Tech Guides are back, and now they're signed!

Get your copy now and help get the short story collection funded!

 

The fans have spoken! Our first short story collection will be titled Combat Frame XSeed: Classified Intel.

The story collection becomes reality when we reach $4000. Help us hit our goal. Back the project now!

 

Stretch Goal 3: a collection of every XSeed short, is now funding! Every book needs a name, so post your best CFXS anthology title in the Comments. Then back the book!

 

 

Stretch Goal 2 crushed! Thanks to our amazing backers, Series 5 XSeed trading cards will become real. Look for them tomorrow.

Now on to Stretch Goal 3! I couldn't wait to tell you guys about this one. You've been asking for it, and now I get to unveil it.

Announcing our 3rd stretch goal: A complete collection of all Combat Frame XSeed short stories! All together for the first time, all in one handy paperback or digital volume! Get us to 400% funding so you can get yours!

 

Stretch Goal 2 Unlocked! Series 5 CFXS trading cards will made available when we reach 300% funding! The polls will open tomorrow to vote for the CFs you want in the next cards set. Keep contributing to ensure we hit 300%!

 

Stretch Goal 1 met! All XSeed: S backers will receive a free Combat Frame XSeed short story!

 

First goal met in 4 hours! Our 1st stretch goal, an original exclusive XSeed short story, unlocked! All backers will receive a digital copy of the short when we reach 200% funding!

 

Space is a graveyard

They came to destroy us ...

... Now they're humanity's only hope

The Guardian Angels race home to confront a traitor. Instead, disaster forces them into a savage battle with an invincible enemy bent on Earth's annihilation.

Can Jehu Red lead his team to victory over a power even greater than their XSeeds? Or will humanity burn on the funeral pyre of history?

If you like Super Dimension Fortress Macross and Mobile Suit Gundam, you’ll love the gripping continuation of #1 best seller Brian Niemeier’s Combat Frame XSeed saga! Back the project now and read the book before anyone else!

 

What Readers Said about Combat Frame XSeed S:

Giant robots in space. This is Niemeier’s best entry yet. Can’t wait to sink my teeth into the next one.

-Adam Lane Smith, bestselling author of Gideon Ira: Knight of the Blood Cross

 

Brian Niemeier continues to find new approaches and situations with each new book. 

-The Pulp Archivist

 

This is the best XSeed novel yet. As always Brian’s books are impossible to put down and leave you thirsty for more. Can’t wait for the next release!

-Christopher Da Pra

The Plan

You funded a complete series of awesome XSeed books and helped launch a second. I shipped those books to my satisfied backers, along with a ton of sweet rewards.

XSeed: S was just the warmup.  Now the hit mech saga goes thermonuclear with Combat Frame XSeed: SS!

Let's dial the fun to 11

I write for my readers, not for gatekeepers. The freedom to entertain you how you want comes with trade-offs: no advance, no art department, and no marketing budget.

When you back this project, you ensure the book gets made, and you get it before anyone else!

Of course, it wouldn't be a CFXS campaign without a dazzling assortment of awesome perks. We're launching this campaign with the most exciting perk selection yet, and we'll be adding more all the time!

First time backer? We've got your back! Every perk tier automatically includes XSeed: S and XSeed: SS in digital. That's right, you get the whole series thus far for backing at any level!

Back Combat Frame XSeed: S , and spread the word to fellow sci fi readers. Indiegogo has share tools to make boosting the signal easy.

Thanks for your support!

-Brian

Stay in the Loop

My official newsletter is the best way to keep up-to-date on my books and special projects. 

Sign up and get a FREE short story set in Kennedy & Wandrey's blockbuster Four Horsemen Universe! Plus get the inside track on news about my books, exclusive offers, and special deals!

-> Subscribe now!

For the steely eyed mecha men out there, I've got a newsletter just for you! Subscriptions to Nova Frontier, the official UCP Armed Services newspaper, are available in the back of every XSeed digital eition! NF subscribers get the free short story "Combat Frame XSeed: CY 2 Gaiden"--available nowhere else!--and first dibs on XSeed news, deals, and exclusives!

Open that XSeed eBook, subscribe now, and get early access to the next campaign!

story:
Short Summary

The Strawberry Road

I reached skyward to touch the universe . . . it wasn't far at all.

It took ten years to write this book. I focused on the beauty of every word and feeling of every experience being meaningful, melodic and true to the character. It is about appreciating what is, and envisioning what could be.  I put more heart and reality and feeling into this book than in anything I had created before.

It could not have been borne at a more appropriate time.  I am proud to share it . . . Ritch

I am an artist and an author. I write about issues, thoughts and situations that are relevant and close to home. I have written comedies, one about cancer, and a dramas, one about about Native Americans, but none have been as relevant and timely as The Strawberry Road.

I have completed the book, edited it, designed the cover and interior and recently self-published it through Amazon (ebook and paperback). Now I am faced with the daunting task of promoting, marketing and getting the book in front of the readers.

Fortunately, I have solicited reviews from independent reviewers and authors- none of whom are known to me personally. I would not have continued if the reviews were not excellent - they were beyond my expectations and hopes. The reviews can be read on Amazon (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083RXGNZN).

What I need now are the funds to help me promote the book in a way that it can reach a mass market of readers.

The Strawberry Road is about appreciating what is, and envisioning what could be. Everyone should read it.

The Story

The Strawberry Road - a unique and provocative journey of the world as we know it but as we rarely see it- told through the vision of an ancient wanderer.  The picturesque tranquility of prose and verse is a rare exploration and insight on a visual journey that we all should take.

The night humbled. I felt small yet I felt like I belonged to something greater than I could understand — a smaller part of a much greater whole.

During the day, the sky belonged to the Earth... At night, the Earth belonged to the sky.

The journey unveils an appreciation of beauty and structure and nature from the perspective of innocence as it explores the wonders and paradox of time. It is about the universe and butterflies and stars and Aspens and the wind. It is about the past and the future and that moment in between.

The past has always just ended, while the future was forever a moment away. Yet I experienced neither but cherished what was solely within my grasp, a sliver of now

It is a first-person account of a visual journey through the picturesque tranquility of prose and verse. where the reader becomes the wanderer and gets a rare insight into the world we touch. Choices are in the moment, without any particular goal other than to meander and explore and understand. The wanderer’s revelations along the way are deeply perceptive, beautifully visual and occasionally ethereal — yet they are all relevant to those of us who accompany the journey.

I can only hope that my footprints will not be taken by the wind.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Fortunately, I had the skills to do the cover and interior layout design and self-published through Amazon/Kindle and avoided those expenses. The market is very competitive and I need funding for promotion and marketing for The Strawberry Road to promote the book to a wide base of readers through social media, blogs, public relations, interviews and advertising. There are several high quality book promotion sites that offer effective access to a wide and relevant reader base. All of the funding raised will go towards the promotion of The Strawberry Road.  If I do not raise the entire amount, I will apply whatever funds have been contributed towards the same goal.

In summary, I need:

  • PR, advertising and promotion
  • Funding for creating an Audiobook
  • Reviews from readers like yourself (Amazon, Goodreads, book clubs, social media, etc.)
  • Spread the word through your social media accounts, book clubs, and friends

The times could not be more appropriate for this book.

For your support, you will receive the following:

  • $15:  Kindle ebook and an acknowledgment in the book
  • $39: Signed paperback and a Kindle ebook and an acknowledgement in the book
  • $99: Signed paperback and a Kindle ebook and an acknowledgement in the book and a The Strawberry Road t-shirt "I reached skyward to touch the universe . . . it wasn't far at all."

 

The Challenge

Our challenge is drawing the attention of readers. With so many books, some very high quality, some otherwise, the field is very competitive. Overcoming this will need strong word of mouth, effective promotion and excellent reviews. So far, The Strawberry Road is off to an excellent start - the book is self-published and the reviews have been excellent! 

We need to continue the momentum of the launch.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. We need to spread the word and share the beauty of The Strawberry Road. Even if you cannot contribute, I would really appreciate your reading The Strawberry Road and leaving a review on Amazon and Goodreads. Of course, spreading the work about the book goes a long way towards its success.

Don't forget that you can use the Indiegogo share tools and your social media to reach a lot of people.

All of the funding raised will go towards the promotion of The Strawberry Road.  If I do not raise the entire amount, I will apply whatever funds have been contributed towards the same goal.
In summary, I need:

PR, advertising and promotion
Funding for creating an Audiobook
Reviews from readers like yourself (Amazon, Goodreads, book clubs, social media, etc.)
Spread the word through your social media accounts, book clubs, and friends

The times could not be more appropriate for this book.
For your support, you will receive the following:

$15:  Kindle ebook and an acknowledgment in the book
$39: Signed paperback and a Kindle ebook and an acknowledgement in the book
$99: Signed paperback and a Kindle ebook and an acknowledgement in the book and a The Strawberry Road t-shirt "I reached skyward to touch the universe . . . it wasn't far at all."

 

The Challenge
Our challenge is drawing the attention of readers. With so many books, some very high quality, some otherwise, the field is very competitive. Overcoming this will need strong word of mouth, effective promotion and excellent reviews. So far, The Strawberry Road is off to an excellent start - the book is self-published and the reviews have been excellent! 
We need to continue the momentum of the launch.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. We need to spread the word and share the beauty of The Strawberry Road. Even if you cannot contribute, I would really appreciate your reading The Strawberry Road and leaving a review on Amazon and Goodreads. Of course, spreading the work about the book goes a long way towards its success.
Don't forget that you can use the Indiegogo share tools and your social media to reach a lot of people.

story:
Story of My Book

Permission to Create is a first of its kind album in a book, complete with lyrics and QR code links that play my songs. The book is about my journey as a professional musician, told through the lens of my songs and the stories and experiences that shaped their writing.

My name is Nate Jones and I am the author of Permission to Create: Embrace your Art and Unleash your True Potential. I wrote this book because like many artists, the Covid-19 pandemic greatly impacted my ability to earn a living doing what I love. People can’t go out to see live music, and musicians and performers of all kinds are really hurting financially. But its not just the financial aspect. For so many artists, live events and community are what nourishes their soul. They help inform our identity and sense of connection. Since I cannot earn money and express myself in the way I am used to, I decided to use my newfound free time to write this book.

I am embracing my role as a storyteller, as someone who conveys vital information to the rest of the tribe through my own experience and creative expression. I believe we have unlimited potential as human beings, and in this book I share my experiences of personal growth, triumph, and healing. I wanted to show fellow artists, musicians, and creative people that all hope is not lost, and our creativity must now flourish in new and exciting ways. Additionally, fans deserve to understand the process behind songwriting, and see how their favorite artists become inspired to create.

My hope is that, in reading these stories and listening to my music, you will discover your own creative potential. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to engage with your personal artistry, whether that be music or another art form. Why? Because just like me, YOU possess the innate potential to be whatever YOU want to be in life. I chose the title “permission to create” because I want people to know that they don’t need anyone else’s permission to express themselves creatively!

What sets this book apart is that I am presenting a new way of merging music, poetry, and literature. Each chapter revolves around a song, starting with the lyrics, and followed by a reflection on the themes and experiences from my life that relate to the song. I convey real stories and insights from my own journey as a professional musician, world traveler, and explorer of consciousness. I’ve also done something special and included QR code links to my songs on my website. This will allow you to scan the page with your phone and listen to the song as you read the chapter.

In these songs and stories, I explore the intersections of music, mindfulness, compassion, and altered states of consciousness. The coolest story I share in this book relates to the first song I ever released. In 2019 my song, Safe As We Can, ended up competing against this guy named Paul McCartney for not one, but two Grammy Awards!

In this book, you'll encounter the multifaceted dimensions of music, mindfulness, and consciousness through stories like:
 
  • Walking down the street in France, entering a random speakeasy and being invited on stage to play drums with the house jazz quartet.
  • When the first song I ever released, Safe As We Can, made the Grammy Awards Ballot competing against Paul McCartney, Blink 182, The Black Keys, and Smashing Pumpkins!
  • Experiencing the healing powers of the visionary plant medicine Ayahuasca, and shortly thereafter being invited to provide music to guide people’s journeys at other sacred ceremonies and retreats.

On this journey, you’ll join me in exploring the creation of mindful music and discovering our true human potential through songs like:
 
  • “Maple Leaf” — Observing and appreciating the interconnectedness of all things.
  • “One Day” — Understanding how just one day can truly make a big difference.
  • “Organic Song” — Learning to trust your intuition and live a life that is authentic to you.
  • "Write This Down — Realizing that everything you keep looking for is already inside of you.

You will love this book if you like rock and roll, exciting stories, spiritual music, and mindfulness. You'll also like this book if you believe in compassion toward people and animals. And you'll definitely like this book if you have experienced the insights and healing that come from altered states of consciousness.

Permission to Create speaks to artists/musicians and people of all talents and abilities who want to embrace music, art, and mindful, conscious living in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Permission to Create inspires reflection and meaningful dialogue, exploring deep, engages you in questions like:
 
  • What is holding me back from pursuing my dreams?
  • Is it possible to create a better community by making more mindful art and music?
  • Could plant medicine and altered states of consciousness help usher in a renaissance of human society and empower us to create a better world together?
I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing these topics will promote positive change for us all, leading to a more peaceful and prosperous society!
 

What I Need & What You'll Get:

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August of 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copies, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to make sure the manuscript is error free prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
 
  • You will receive a personally autographed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note/Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much, much more!


About the Author:

Nate Jones is a Grammy Ballot Recording Artist, Singer/Songwriter, and Creative Wellness Coach from Warwick, Rhode Island. His main interests are music, mindfulness, creativity, animals, and healing plant medicines including Ayahuasca and psilocybin mushrooms.

Nate is passionate about inspiring people to pursue their dreams while living healthy, creative, connected lives full of meaning and purpose. Fun fact: Nate used to be an American Ninja Warrior coach before making the transition to full-time musician!

When he’s not on stage, Nate enjoys traveling the world, exploring other cultures, playing rock and roll in the basement, and living a vegan lifestyle in order to reduce harm toward animals, underprivileged communities, and the planet. He could talk for hours about music, visionary art, traveling, psychedelics, and personal growth.

For more information, you can connect with Nate Jones at natemusicjones@gmail.com and at www.natejones.world, as well as www.facebook.com/natejonesacoustic.
 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #PermissiontoCreate and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Nate Jones

story:
OVERVIEW

IS YOUR WEIGHT OUT OF CONTROL?

 

I HAVE  LOST OVER 300 POUNDS IN A LITTLE OVER A YEAR, AND THE FIRST 200 POUNDS CAME OFF IN LESS THAN A YEAR. HOW MUCH DO YOU WANT TO LOSE? 

 

Hi! I'm Big John, YouTube's "The Fasting Fatman." This book is about a journey that took me from weighing 530 pounds to 215 pounds in just over a year. Along the way I learned a lot about myself, my eating addiction, and the best way to not only lose weight quickly, but keep it off for life. I have always been overweight, I've gone on countless diets, and bought hundreds of miracle pills, lotions, and equipment, to lose weight, to be "normal."  I would lose the excess weight many times over, only to always gain it all back, and then some.  I was obese as a child, and eventually I became a morbidly obese adult. This book will highlight my journey, and the new way of relating to food and my addiction that has not only managed to help me get in shape, but is also helping a large pool of people that I am currently coaching on my strategy for permanent weight loss. This book will be your guide to a new, healthier you. A you that is no longer controlled by food addiction.

The Fasting Fatman’s method and philosophy is tested and refined with various fasting techniques that slowly but surely completely resets the appetite and causes a complete “paradigm shift” when it comes to your relationship with food.

 

TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR HEALTH THROUGH FASTING

This book will help you create a crystal clear picture of the health you really want, uncover hidden traps that causes you to fail at weight loss, and put together a specific plan to help you stop the madness and make becoming a healthier you a priority, and trust me, a healthier you will be your new obsession!

 

MISSION

My mission is to guide you on your journey to complete healthiness from the inside out. I believe that fasting will truly heal the mind and body, with the fringe benefit of rapid weight loss. I will share my experience with you, and you will come to understand that our food addiction is universal, therefore, if I can conquer my addiction, you can conquer yours.

This book will teach you everything I did, and everything I learned to lose over 300 pounds in such a short time frame, I want to help people to stop being food addicts and learn how to keep the cravings under control.

 

 

THE PROBLEM

 

 

  • Worldwide obesity has nearly tripled since 1975.
  • In 2016, more than 1.9 billion adults, 18 years and older, were overweight. Of these, over 650 million were obese.
  • 39% of adults aged 18 years and over were overweight in 2016 (39% of Men and 40% of women), and 13% were obese.
  • Most of the world's population live in countries where overweight and obesity kills more people than underweight.
  • 38 million children under the age of 5 were overweight or obese in 2019.
  • Over 340 million children and adolescents aged 5-19 were overweight or obese in 2016.

 

Common Health Consequences of Being Overweight and Obesity

 

Raised BMI is a major risk factor for noncommunicable diseases such as:

  • cardiovascular diseases (mainly heart disease and stroke), which were the leading cause of death in 2012;
  • diabetes;
  • musculoskeletal disorders (especially osteoarthritis – a highly disabling degenerative disease of the joints);
  • some cancers (including endometrial, breast, ovarian, prostate, liver, gallbladder, kidney, and colon).

The risk for these Non-communicable diseases increases, with increases in BMI.

Childhood obesity is associated with a higher chance of obesity, premature death and disability in adulthood. But, in addition, obese children experience breathing difficulties, increased risk of fractures, hypertension, early markers of cardiovascular disease, insulin resistance and psychological effects.

 

 

 

 

Human beings can only be in one of the following states: Fed or Fasted. The problem in today’s modern world is that we are in the fed state most of the time. Unlike thousands of years ago when food was scarce, today we live in a world where food is in overabundance. Unfortunately, this may not be true for millions of people around the world, but the fact is that we are facing obesity and starvation epidemics simultaneously. But for most of you reading this right now, there is overabundance and food is literally available the moment you think about it.

 

 

 

 

THE SOLUTON

  • THE FASTING FATMAN’S BOOK: I didn’t get to weighing over 500 pounds by having good eating habits, but I was able to overcome my addiction and take control of my health! My methods work! My methods are the solution to overcoming obesity.

Genetically, we are designed to be in fed and fasted state almost equally and that’s why we can go long periods without eating at all.  Our body stores fat for a rainy day. As long as you have the fat cells, your body can easily remain in a fasted state for an extended period of time. Now extended fasting isn’t the only method that you can use to lose weight. You can do short fasts like Intermittent Fasting, or Alternate Day Fasting, all of which I have done and cover in this book.

  • You will learn that you can eat your favorite foods and still lose weight, build muscle and optimize your health. Sounds too good to be true? Maybe it is. Find out for yourself.
 

 

 

ABOUT ME

 

My Name is Big John AKA “THE AMAZING FASTING FATMAN.” I am a simple father who decided that there was nothing more important than the love I have for my son. And, in order to be in his life as long as possible, I had to give up my obsession with food. I have struggled with obesity all my life, but I finally decided to stop making excuses, and lose the weight. I have lost over 300 lbs, in la little over a year, and I documented everything on my YouTube channel, The Fasting Fatman. I am now healthy and fit. Fasting has helped take care of my high blood pressure too. I used to take 10mg of Enalapril daily, to control my high blood pressure, now my blood pressure is normal, and I am no longer on medication. I am currently a certified fasting coach and I now help others transform their bodies and the way they relate to food. My Book explains fully How I Went without Food for 150 Days, as well as my diving into different eating regimens like Keto OMAD (One Meal A Day), and Carnivore OMAD. You will learn all that I have learned in order to gain a very powerful skill; the ability to speak to, and control your addiction.

 

You can check out my website here  akathecoach.com

YouTube channel   

 

 

 

LEARN ALL YOU CAN ABOUT FASTING  

 

  • Fasting Is One of The Fastest Ways To Lose Weight

You may think you know all there is to know about fasting, but I may surprise you. Something as simple as intermittent fasting, restricting your food intake to a specific time window, without even It limiting the types of food you eat can lead to significant weight loss. In this book I discuss things like how a simple intermittent fasting regimen was found to reduce body weight by 3-8% over a period of 3-24 weeks. You’ll learn of numerous benefits for metabolic health, and how it may even help prevent chronic diseases and expand lifespan.

  • Fasting Helps Lower Your Blood Pressure
  • Fasting Helps Control Blood Sugar
  • Fasting Helps Boosted Brain Function
  • Fasting Can Help Prevent Cancer

 

What Does a Fasting Coach Do Exactly?

 

Probably much more than you think! I am a true advocate of fasting! Someone who has done all manners of fasting, I help guide, support, and work with people to achieve their weight goals and overcome life’s daily sticky situations.

I lost weight initially by fasting, and then kept losing it by focusing on proper nutrition with an intermittent fasting lifestyle. I also tried out the Ketogenic diet, the carnivore diet, and a host of fasting regimens, all detailed in the book. I will impart my knowledge, tips, and experience on to you to help you succeed and gain a solid foundation of understanding. This will help you create lifelong tools for optimum health, wellness, and above all, addiction control. Remember, food addiction is uniquely different from all other addictions in that ours is the only one where complete abstinence is not the cure. We have to partake in the same thing that triggers the beast within, so while we nibble on the carrot, our mind bombards us with the thought of fried chicken. Help me get this book out and spread the way to move forward and cage this beast.

 

 

 

CAMPAIGN OBJECTIVE

 

What We Need

Right now, we are turning to you for helping to raise the funds that we need to complete the development, implementation, and to market to a global audience.

To raise enough money to self-publish a definitive book on fasting, and using prolonged fasting to beat food addiction. The title of the book is “HOW TO LOSE OVER 200 POUNDS IN LESS THAN A YEAR.”

 

What you get.

Below I've detailed what you'll receive based upon your donation to this campaign

 

$15 perks

  • A digital copy of THE AMAZING FASTING FATMAN'S EBOOK.

 

 

$30 perk

  • A signed PAPERBACK of the AMAZING FASTING FATMAN'S BOOK.

 

 

$125 perk

  • EBOOK
  • A ONE MONTH EMAIL COACHING PROGRAM  FROM BIG JOHN AKA-THE AMAZING FASTING FATMAN

 

 

$450 perk

  • EBOOK
  • PAPERBACK
  • ONE MONTH ONE-ON-ONE PERSONAL COACHING FROM THE FASTING FATMAN VIA SKYPE OR ZOOM

 

$1250 perk

  • EBOOK
  •  SIGNED PAPERBACK
  • 3 MONTHS ONE-ON-ONE PERSONAL COACHING FROM THE FASTING FATMAN VIA SKYPE OR ZOOM

 

 

 

THE IMPACT

Fasting worked for me and it can work for others as well.  The clients I am personally coaching now, can attest to that. Reading what I have achieved, and how I achieved it is the first step towards a better health, if you are indeed overweight. This Books has the power to inspire others that are in a similar situation to where I was, to do the same thing I did. If done the right way, I know my message can have a large impact beyond the borders of my own country, because I am currently coaching people around the world. That is why I know for a fact, that our addiction is universal.

This is a unique story and process about losing weight that embodies a message of hope for other. The vision within the Book is to plant a seed of possibility and potential that everyone is capable of complete control of the mind and body, of not only losing the weight, which a lot of us have done, but also keeping it off forever.

 

RISK AND CHALLENGES

 

As with most crowd funding projects, there may be some unexpected circumstances and/or scenarios; but our team is fully prepared to take on any challenges by virtue of our full preparedness and crowd funding experience.

If we do run into any logistical challenges so significant that may delay us, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to buying this eBook. You can show your support by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware the more it will make this campaign a success.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing

Over 340 million children and adolescents aged 5-19 were overweight or obese in 2016.
 Common Health Consequences of Being Overweight and Obesity Raised BMI is a major risk factor for noncommunicable diseases such as:
cardiovascular diseases (mainly heart disease and stroke), which were the leading cause of death in 2012;
diabetes;
musculoskeletal disorders (especially osteoarthritis – a highly disabling degenerative disease of the joints);
some cancers (including endometrial, breast, ovarian, prostate, liver, gallbladder, kidney, and colon).

The risk for these Non-communicable diseases increases, with increases in BMI.Childhood obesity is associated with a higher chance of obesity, premature death and disability in adulthood. But, in addition, obese children experience breathing difficulties, increased risk of fractures, hypertension, early markers of cardiovascular disease, insulin resistance and psychological effects.    Human beings can only be in one of the following states: Fed or Fasted. The problem in today’s modern world is that we are in the fed state most of the time. Unlike thousands of years ago when food was scarce, today we live in a world where food is in overabundance. Unfortunately, this may not be true for millions of people around the world, but the fact is that we are facing obesity and starvation epidemics simultaneously. But for most of you reading this right now, there is overabundance and food is literally available the moment you think about it.    THE SOLUTONTHE FASTING FATMAN’S BOOK: I didn’t get to weighing over 500 pounds by having good eating habits, but I was able to overcome my addiction and take control of my health! My methods work! My methods are the solution to overcoming obesity.Genetically, we are designed to be in fed and fasted state almost equally and that’s why we can go long periods without eating at all.  Our body stores fat for a rainy day. As long as you have the fat cells, your body can easily remain in a fasted state for an extended period of time. Now extended fasting isn’t the only method that you can use to lose weight. You can do short fasts like Intermittent Fasting, or Alternate Day Fasting, all of which I have done and cover in this book.You will learn that you can eat your favorite foods and still lose weight, build muscle and optimize your health. Sounds too good to be true? Maybe it is. Find out for yourself.   ABOUT ME My Name is Big John AKA “THE AMAZING FASTING FATMAN.” I am a simple father who decided that there was nothing more important than the love I have for my son. And, in order to be in his life as long as possible, I had to give up my obsession with food. I have struggled with obesity all my life, but I finally decided to stop making excuses, and lose the weight. I have lost over 300 lbs, in la little over a year, and I documented everything on my YouTube channel, The Fasting Fatman. I am now healthy and fit. Fasting has helped take care of my high blood pressure too. I used to take 10mg of Enalapril daily, to control my high blood pressure, now my blood pressure is normal, and I am no longer on medication. I am currently a certified fasting coach and I now help others transform their bodies and the way they relate to food. My Book explains fully How I Went without Food for 150 Days, as well as my diving into different eating regimens like Keto OMAD (One Meal A Day), and Carnivore OMAD. You will learn all that I have learned in order to gain a very powerful skill; the ability to speak to, and control your addiction. You can check out my website here  akathecoach.comYouTube channel      LEARN ALL YOU CAN ABOUT FASTING   Fasting Is One of The Fastest Ways To Lose WeightYou may think you know all there is to know about fasting, but I may surprise you. Something as simple as intermittent fasting, restricting your food intake to a specific time window, without even It limiting the types of food you eat can lead to significant weight loss. In this book I discuss things like how a simple intermittent fasting regimen was found to reduce body weight by 3-8% over a period of 3-24 weeks. You’ll learn of numerous benefits for metabolic health, and how it may even help prevent chronic diseases and expand lifespan.
Fasting Helps Lower Your Blood Pressure
Fasting Helps Control Blood Sugar
Fasting Helps Boosted Brain Function
Fasting Can Help Prevent Cancer
 What Does a Fasting Coach Do Exactly? Probably much more than you think! I am a true advocate of fasting! Someone who has done all manners of fasting, I help guide, support, and work with people to achieve their weight goals and overcome life’s daily sticky situations.I lost weight initially by fasting, and then kept losing it by focusing on proper nutrition with an intermittent fasting lifestyle. I also tried out the Ketogenic diet, the carnivore diet, and a host of fasting regimens, all detailed in the book. I will impart my knowledge, tips, and experience on to you to help you succeed and gain a solid foundation of understanding. This will help you create lifelong tools for optimum health, wellness, and above all, addiction control. Remember, food addiction is uniquely different from all other addictions in that ours is the only one where complete abstinence is not the cure. We have to partake in the same thing that triggers the beast within, so while we nibble on the carrot, our mind bombards us with the thought of fried chicken. Help me get this book out and spread the way to move forward and cage this beast.   CAMPAIGN OBJECTIVE  What We Need Right now, we are turning to you for helping to raise the funds that we need to complete the development, implementation, and to market to a global audience.To raise enough money to self-publish a definitive book on fasting, and using prolonged fasting to beat food addiction. The title of the book is “HOW TO LOSE OVER 200 POUNDS IN LESS THAN A YEAR.” What you get.Below I've detailed what you'll receive based upon your donation to this campaign $15 perksA digital copy of THE AMAZING FASTING FATMAN'S EBOOK.  $30 perkA signed PAPERBACK of the AMAZING FASTING FATMAN'S BOOK.  $125 perk
EBOOK
A ONE MONTH EMAIL COACHING PROGRAM  FROM BIG JOHN AKA-THE AMAZING FASTING FATMAN
  $450 perk
EBOOK
PAPERBACK
ONE MONTH ONE-ON-ONE PERSONAL COACHING FROM THE FASTING FATMAN VIA SKYPE OR ZOOM
 $1250 perk
EBOOK
 SIGNED PAPERBACK
3 MONTHS ONE-ON-ONE PERSONAL COACHING FROM THE FASTING FATMAN VIA SKYPE OR ZOOM
   THE IMPACTFasting worked for me and it can work for others as well.  The clients I am personally coaching now, can attest to that. Reading what I have achieved, and how I achieved it is the first step towards a better health, if you are indeed overweight. This Books has the power to inspire others that are in a similar situation to where I was, to do the same thing I did. If done the right way, I know my message can have a large impact beyond the borders of my own country, because I am currently coaching people around the world. That is why I know for a fact, that our addiction is universal.This is a unique story and process about losing weight that embodies a message of hope for other. The vision within the Book is to plant a seed of possibility and potential that everyone is capable of complete control of the mind and body, of not only losing the weight, which a lot of us have done, but also keeping it off forever. RISK AND CHALLENGES As with most crowd funding projects, there may be some unexpected circumstances and/or scenarios; but our team is fully prepared to take on any challenges by virtue of our full preparedness and crowd funding experience.If we do run into any logistical challenges so significant that may delay us, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop.  Other Ways You Can HelpIn addition to buying this eBook. You can show your support by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware the more it will make this campaign a success.      We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing

story:
¿Qué?

Aviones de papel habla de una época no muy lejana cuyas consecuencias aun nos golpean a día de hoy, especialmente, en aspectos sociales.

«Tenía trece años recién cumplidos y fue la primera vez que me enfrenté a él». Así comienza la historia de Satur, una chica de un pueblo de Toledo que, con toda la inocencia de su niñez, pretende decidir sobre su propia vida. En plena dictadura del general Franco, desafía a su autoritario padre, cuya frase favorita es: «¡No se hable más!». Satur tiene que enfrentarse a siglos de tradición, que le han asignado un papel idéntico al de su madre y al de su abuela, sin más opciones que el sometimiento a una autoridad que había sido otorgada, como decían las monedas, por la gracia de Dios. El choque con la realidad es brutal y Satur acaba viendo pasar su vida desde el chiscón de una portería de la capital.

Satur nos cuenta, con un lenguaje directo y sencillo, su  historia, marcada desde el principio por los enfrentamientos con su padre y por su odio al tabaco, que la llevará a vivir los momentos más trágicos de su vida. A lo largo de la novela, esta heroína humilde descubre que no está sola y con el apoyo, nada desdeñable, de Manuela, la pescadera del barrio, Shamira, una inmigrante africana ilegal, y su querido Ernesto, se enfrenta a unos impresionantes molinos. Gracias a ellos, poco a poco, irá descubriendo su camino y aprendiendo a perdonar a su padre y a reconciliarse consigo misma.

Desde su anonimato, Satur hace cosas que jamás había imaginado, desde su insignificancia consigue logros impensables y aprende, mirando hacia atrás, de los que parecen más desafortunados que ella. Satur nos cuenta una historia de gente buena, de hombres y sobre todo de mujeres, que desde la ignorancia, y sin más protección que la intemperie, mueven la rueda que trae y se lleva todos  los cambios.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy se nos presenta Pilar Gutiérrez Garzón.

Nací en Toledo el 21 de marzo de 1948. Allí fui al Colegio y, más tarde al Instituto donde estudié hasta terminar lo que entonces se llamaba Bachillerato Superior. Inmediatamente después hice oposiciones para la antigua Caja de Ahorros de Toledo, oposición que gané con el número uno. Cuando me casé, me fui a vivir a Madrid y cuatro años después, viví, durante un año y medio, con mis hijos y mi marido en los Estados Unidos.

De vuelta a Madrid, ejercí de ama de casa y madre hasta que mis hijos crecieron. Entonces, trabajé como voluntaria en dos ONG’s: primero cinco años como responsable del Departamento de Educación en Manos Unidas. Y luego en la Fundación Entreculturas, donde fui responsable, durante nueve años, del Departamento de Servicios Generales.

Al tener más tiempo libre, empecé a escribir. Me matriculé en la Escuela de Escritores de Madrid. Allí he hecho varios cursos: uno de escritura creativa, otro de redacción y estilo, tres de itinerario de novela y, por último y, de momento, uno de escritura dramática. Hasta ahora, he publicado varios relatos y novelas: ¿Dónde estás?  (relato publicado en El sueño del Gato, Antología de literatura breve), Madrid sin él (relato publicado en Queda la música), La Daga (Bubok Publishing, 2014), El sabor de las cerezas (Editorial Onuba, 2015).

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Aviones de papel que saldría después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Pilar Gutiérrez Garzón vea publicada esta obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
¿Qué?

Niños de la noche toma su nombre de las Agrupaciones Guerrilleras republicanas durante la guerra (un equivalente a los boinas verdes o fuerzas especiales actuales) y transcurre en unos paisajes tan bellos como amenazadores. A ningún buen lector defraudará su lectura.

En un paisaje desolado por la miseria tras la guerra, un joven guardia civil deberá conducir a un asesino hasta el peor penal del país. Lo que debía ser un servicio ordinario se verá alterado por un mundo de violencia y odio en donde la mera supervivencia parece un objetivo inalcanzable.

Con sus personajes como hilo conductor, Niños de la noche recupera una parte poco conocida de nuestra Memoria Histórica. Algunos de los hechos más cruentos de nuestra historia reciente son recuperados del olvido, junto a la represión posterior a la guerra civil liderada en el terreno por partidas mercenarias a la caza del hombre en un homenaje a aquellos que dieron sus vidas por la libertad y el progreso, enfrentados en una guerra de guerrillas sin posibilidad alguna de victoria.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Paco Santana.

Periodista de trayectoria  ligada al mundo local, su oficio lo ha llevado a Madrid, Andalucía y Catalunya. Actualmente reside en  Santa Coloma de Gramenet, una ciudad del gran Área Metropolitana de Barcelona. Dirigió la revista La Veu del Besòs y la juvenil ONLIYU.  Ha sido conductor del magazine radiofónico Vivir para oir, primer director del canal local de Televisión en Priego de Córdoba, responsable de informativos en Grama Radio y conductor y director de l’Informatiu en Tele Taxi Televisión. En la actualidad, es redactor y gestor de contenidos en el Departamento de Información Digital y Redes de una institución pública. Creador del Blog El hombre que sabía demasiado, es premio Pentagrama 2010 por su labor profesional.

Como narrador ha publicado las novelas Donde termina la tierra y El Tercer Secreto. Premio Bon Profit de relatos (2005) y finalista del Certamen de Creación  Literaria Bubok (2009)

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 840€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán como ayuda para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Niños de la noche que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Paco Santana vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
I'm Bill Hatcher, an author and teacher whose passion is social justice. My new book is Principles of Flight. As a bush pilot in Africa and Alaska, I explore the cultural motivations for violence, but also a global shift in consciousness taking shape today. Love, tragedy, and the test of overwhelming odds provide backdrop for this breathtaking story of hope. (My first book, The Marble Room, received excellent national reviews. Principles is expected to attract even more attention.)

The campaign threshold is $2600. Right now, you can pre-order Principles of Flight. Your support will help me reach the amount required to fund this book’s publication. One copy is $25, which covers shipping and tax. But time is short. The funding deadline is midnight, June 3rd. If we do not meet the deadline, you are charged nothing.

If we do meet the deadline, then your credit card will be charged the amount you pledged, and my book goes into publication. This process typically takes six months to one year. So with luck, you will receive your copy by Christmas, though it could take a little longer. I will keep you updated on its progress all along the way.

Whether you buy one copy or ten -- or even if you can't afford to pre-order -- please help spread the word on Facebook and other social media. Because we are all in this together!

Peace, and thank you!

story:
Mi nombre es Catalina Vidal. Vivo por elección en Huéscar desde hace diez años. Al llegar al territorio por primera vez me enamoró por sus paisajes, diversos y eclécticos, como reflejo en el libro. Luego vino la historia local, de una riqueza y relevancia tal que me hizo comprender con mayor precisión la historia general de este país. Al entrar en contacto con las personas, estas me transmitieron su visión del territorio; esta tierra es pobre, fea, y carece de oportunidades de futuro para sus habitantes. Eso me llevó a reconocer los recursos que tiene, que son quizás demasiados para un territorio tan pequeño y tan poco poblado. Cuando se tienen muchos recursos, tanto económicos como endógenos, y está todo por hacer, el problema está prácticamente resuelto: manos a la obra.  Sin embargo no es así en la realidad. Los dineros llegan, sobre todo de la UE, pero los suelen utilizar en actuaciones peregrinas nada prácticas,  con presupuestos inflados, y que además no van acompañadas de un proyecto de continuidad. Los recursos endógenos solamente sirven para obtener dinero público, pero no para el aprovechamiento de los mismos desde un punto de vista laboral y económico que dote al territorio de un futuro viable.

En estos tiempos en que aflora al público la corrupción diariamente, parece que hablar de corrupción en una comarca poco poblada no es ninguna novedad ni aporta nada nuevo al panorama de la corrupción. Pero no es así, No basta con señalar la corrupción, es necesario aportar soluciones una vez se logre erradicarla. Por otro lado, estoy hablando, no de políticos imputados, que alguno tenemos por el territorio, más bien del conjunto de las corruptelas de la comarca, el origen, el desarollo y las consecuencias,  como han influido en el desarrollo del territorio. Si la ciudadanía las conociera todas: trayectoria, como nos engañan, cuantía, partidos políticos implicados en ellas, que habría sido de la comarca si las hubieran utilizado el dinero correctamente para el desarrollo de la comunidad, proporcionando empleos dignos, cultura, posibilidad de alimentación saludable, mermando el impacto medio ambiental en la construcción ¿seguría apoyando las politicas actuales o reivindicaria otro rumbo?

Sostenibilidad es una palabra degradada por el mal uso que se ha hecho de ella desde que comenzó a circular como medida de futuro para equilibrar producción/comercialización/consumo. Pero para mi sigue estando vigente. La comarca, extraordinariamente dotada de recursos endógenos, bien podría ser un hito en sostenibilidad real, con el consiguiente beneficio para el conjunto de la ciudadanía y del medio ambiente, sin esfuerzos, medidas, ni inversiones adicionales.

Es cierto que las nuevas políticas que parece que se avecinan tratan en cierto modo la sostenibilidad dándole un nombre nuevo, pero da la sensación de que están en fase abstracta todavía, y contempladas a nivel global y no personalizado como requiere la sostenibilidad, pues en cada región los recursos y las necesidades son diferentes.

En este sentido, las aportaciones que hago en “Comarca de Huéscar: historia, corrupción, sostenibilidad” pueden ser útiles a la hora de ir configurando la sostenibilidad por territorios.

La financiación que necesita “Comarca de Huéscar: historia, corrupción, sostenibilidad” es de 7.930 € para la edición de 1.000 ejemplares y un cálculo, quizás estimado a la baja, para el envío de libros al territorio español, y un porcentaje mínimo a países europeos y americanos. El valor económico de los obsequios adjuntos, por supuesto, no se incluyen, ya que en parte han sido donados con ese objeto, o pertenecen a mi propio fondo de piezas artesanales de tapices y pequeños objetos artesanales de producción propia. Tampoco el diseño de la portada del libro, ni de los marca páginas que acompañan al libro, pues han sido diseñados por colaboradoras del proyecto del libro.

Es la primera vez que escribo un libro, aunque desde hace años he publicado artículos y columnas de crítica política y social local en blog y foros, que han tenido una relativa trascendencia. Pero en este caso, estoy "muerta" de miedo, pues me asaltan dudas respecto a si habré incluido todo lo relevante y lo habré hecho de forma coherente y comprensible. Quienes han tenido acceso a parte de los textos dicen que se trata de un trabajo de investigación periodística, rigurosa,  minuciosa y de calidad.

Es cierto que he puesto todo el empeño en reflejar la realidad tal cual es, pues es fundamental para que se pueda poner en marcha un proyecto de desarrollo sostenible integral para la comarca, que supondría la salida de la miseria en la que se encuentra inmersa, proporcionando empleos dignos, un exquisito cuidado al medio ambiente del territorio, y una alimentación sana para el conjunto de la población.

El objetivo de "Comarca de Huéscar: historia, corrupción, sostenibilidad", es que llegue a un gran número de personas en el territorio, para que, a través del conocimiento de su territorio, de su historia, de quienes nos gobiernan, y de los recursos endógenos que disponemos, se sacudan el complejo de inferioridad global que los constriñe y que fundamenten el futuro no en base a promesas vacías, sino en realidades viables.

Por otro lado, la radiografía de esta comarca, la estructura, las fuentes sobre las que se fundamenta, pueden ser igualmente útiles para cualquier otra comarca que arrastre desempleo y despoblación, aplicando para su desarrollo el reconocimiento y valorización de sus propios recursos.

Ignoro cual puede ser el grado de aceptación de este libro, cuantas personas podrán estar interesadas en su lectura. Me gustaría, no ya que fuesen mil, sino miles, pues eso significaría, de entrada, que ese número de personas, tienen interés en el futuro de sus pueblos y en participar activamente en el desarrollo del mismo. Las propuestas que indico en el libro pueden ampliarse con otras aportaciones que a mi se me han escapado e igualmente pueden servir como punto de partida para otras experiencias en otros territorios. Hay que pensar que, en el caso de que se implantaran generalizadamente en este país, o en cualquier otro, se habrían resuelto graves problemas actuales de desempleo, pobreza, emigración, energía, medio ambiente, y en una pequeña parte, cambio climático. Por eso es tan importante para mí la difusión de este libro.

Aunque, he de reconocer, que si bien me vuelco totalmente en defender las posibilidades reales de sostenibilidades locales comunitarias que solucionarían graves problemas de distinta índole, no estoy capacitada para venderme a mi misma, es decir, para promocionarme individualmente, Nunca he sido buena en ese aspecto. Por lo tanto, no se que grado de éxito pueda tener en este sentido.

La colaboración de personas que me desconocen por completo, y que de la obra a publicar únicamente saben  lo que apunto sobre ella, no solamente pueden participar económicamente, que es importantísimo, sino que también pueden hacerlo en un grado similar de importancia, de estar interesadas en el tema, difundiendo la campaña de recaudación para la impresión y distribución del libro. Y, sobre todo, leyendo el libro, por la posibilidad que puede tener para que aporte ideas en sostenibilidad práctica para aplicarlas en sus territorios.

Para más información, sobre la comarca, el libro y sobre mi misma les recomiendo que entren a

Facebook Comarca de Huéscar: historia, corrupción, sostenibilidad

Facebook Catalina Vidal

Blog territoriodelaovejaverde.blogspot.com

Muchísimas gracias a quienes hayan leído hasta el final de esta exposición. Cualquier información adicional que requieran, pueden contactar conmigo a través del servicio de mensajes privados de Facebook o enviarme un correo a ktaoliver@hotmail.com. Si les interesa el tema, no dejen de colaborar en el proyecto, en la medida en que les sea posible.

vino la historia local, de una riqueza y relevancia tal que me hizo comprender
con mayor precisión la historia general de este país. Al entrar en contacto con
las personas, estas me transmitieron su visión del territorio; esta tierra es
pobre, fea, y carece de oportunidades de futuro para sus habitantes. Eso me llevó
a reconocer los recursos que tiene, que son quizás demasiados para un
territorio tan pequeño y tan poco poblado. Cuando se tienen muchos recursos,
tanto económicos como endógenos, y está
todo por hacer, el problema está prácticamente resuelto: manos a la obra.  Sin embargo no es así en la realidad. Los

story:
What's All This?

Lateral is an online magazine focused on the interaction of science with wider human society, including medicine, the media, philosophy, law, education, history, politics, art, culture, and more. Through publication, it will soon create paid opportunities for up-and-coming young science communicators and artists, and engage a wide audience with the ideas and value of science.

In other words, Lateral is a great, free science magazine that everyone can enjoy, put together by the next generation of scientific and creative minds, launching in early August. Interested?

Our writing and editorial team is made up of young people with backgrounds in scientific research and communications from Australia and around the world. We know there are great science stories waiting to be told by young people, and we want to provide these aspiring writers and communicators with an outlet for their unique voices and outlooks, all while building a compelling and original magazine for our readers.

Lateral is a project of the Young Australian Skeptics, a group that has supported the exploration of science, critical thinking, pseudoscience, philosophy, education and youth issues through online writing and podcasting since 2008.

The Team

The editorial team behind Lateral is composed of young scientists and science students with a range of backgrounds in writing, editing and science communication.

Top: Jack, Nicola, Andrew, Ellie. Bottom: Bryonie, Tessa, Sara, Natalie.

Editor-in-Chief and Founder: Jack Scanlan

Jack is an insect geneticist from the University of Melbourne and President of the Young Australian Skeptics. An active science communicator for close to a decade, he blogs for SciLogs and has written for COSMOS Magazine and Nature Education. When he's not communicating science, he obsesses over wasps and bees a little too much to be healthy. 

Deputy Editor-in-Chief: Nicola McCaskill

Nicola is an immunology and journalism student at Monash University. She's been working towards a career in science media since high school, seeking to combine her two passions. A self-styled protégé of the great Ms Valerie Frizzle, Nicola has written and edited for Monash publications Lot's Wife and Mojo, and presented for Radio Monash. A keen cinephile, she also has a third major in film studies. 

Life Science Editor: Andrew Katsis

Andrew is a zoologist at the University of Melbourne, specialising in bird behaviour. He has written and edited science articles for The Conversation, and produced the radio program A Science Story for SYN 90.7 FM.

Life Science Deputy Editor: Ellie Michaelides

Ellie is a zoologist by trade, but loves talking about science more than doing science. She currently works as a communicator at the scientific PR agency Science in Public. She's addicted to buying books, and enjoys baking (and eating) cupcakes, and loves all her furry friends at Healesville Sanctuary where she volunteers.

Physical Science Editors: Bryonie Scott and Tessa Evans

Bryonie is an astrophysicist at the University of Melbourne. An eager science communicator, she has written and edited news articles for The Conversation. Her hobbies include telling anyone who’ll listen where planets are in the night sky.

Tessa is primarily a chemist. When not tinkering in the lab, she researches hydrophobic surfaces, coal dust emission, and carbon storage in marine coastal environments. She has been an editorial intern at The Conversation, and currently writes papers for a research group at Deakin University. She likes to attend science events and synthesise strange concoctions in her kitchen.

Art & Popular Culture Editor: Sara Nyhuis

Sara is a zoology and linguistics student at Monash University. She has done thesis editing for Masters students, assisted with research into the effects of anthropogenic light pollution on bats in Borneo, and written for the Monash University Library blog. She is a devoted comic book collector, a sci-fi and gaming enthusiast, and writes short stories in her spare time.

Society & Education Deputy Editor: Natalie McKirdy

Natalie is a PhD student at University of Queensland specialising in retinal degeneration and silk based biomaterials. She is a Young Science Ambassador with the Wonder of Science program, was a regular co-host of the Sciencism podcast, and tutors primary and middle school pre-service teachers in the delivery of enquiry based science lessons.

Our team is still growing – if you have writing and/or editorial experience and would like to be involved, we'd love to hear from you.

Thinking Lateral-ly

Science increasingly dominates every aspect of our lives, and many people now realise the importance of properly communicating new research to the public.

But let's be honest: for all the current enthusiasm around the communication of science, there aren't a lot of opportunities for young scientists and journalists to hone their writing skills in an editorial environment. Writing for a personal blog, while useful and rewarding, usually doesn't prepare you for a world of deadlines and editorial demands. Plus, at the end of the day, it's hard to put blogging on your resumé.

Lateral was designed to help fill this gap, bringing new voices and artists to the science media landscape - while also being a fantastic publication that will appeal to a wide audience, many of them also younger people. It will also pay all of its contributors, a rarity in the modern media landscape for younger writers and artists.

The Young Australian Skeptics is proud to be bringing Lateral into the world as part of its mission to improve science communication to and from young people. Since 2008, the YAS has been publishing online articles on its eclectic group blog, has produced hundreds of hours of audio on two science and critical thinking-themed podcasts, The Pseudoscientists and Unfiltered Thoughts, and published the Skeptical Blog Anthology (2012), a collection of some of the Internet's best writing on science and skepticism.  And don't worry - we're not climate change deniers.

The Virtues of Crowdfunding

Why Do We Need All This Money?

Reimbursing our writers and artists for their time and effort is one of our top priorities – too many opportunities for new science communicators are unpaid, and we're bucking that trend. We're also designing Lateral with the fantastic team of young web developers over at DesignGel, who need to be paid. Our crowdfunding goal covers these costs of design, as well as providing funds for our first 6 months of articles and magazine content.

The cost of designing Lateral is $3,600, and 6 months of contributor payments, based on our planned publication frequency, is a little over $4,500. The headroom in our initial goal is to allow for the gradual expansion of the number of columns in the magazine, buffer against processing fees incurred during this campaign, and other, smaller initial website management costs. 

What Do You Get Out of It?

You'd think helping to bring a new publication to life from the depths of imagination would be reward enough ‒ but no, there's other stuff you can get if you support Lateral's creation. We thought long and hard about these perks, and realised that if you're willing to support a science communication magazine, you'd probably love to get involved somehow, rather than claim a low-quality, mass-produced t-shirt.

So, based on your contribution, you can sponsor an article or even an entire column for a whole year! Whoa. For those who want to get even more direct, you can commission an article about a topic of your choosing or choose an entire future month's theme. You'd be like a god. A science writing god. We're even throwing a launch party in Melbourne for those of you who want to meet us all in person: truly the greatest gift of all.

But What If...?

If we reach over 100% of our $10,000 goal, we've got some great ideas about how we would use such a generous outpouring of support, other than investing solely in future month-by-month operating costs of the magazine:

$15,000: If we reach 150% funding, we'll commission unique artwork for all of our articles, not just our featured themed articles. That's more gorgeous science-inspired artwork every month. Fantastic. 

$20,000: 200% funded means at least more 5 more articles per month, all with unique artwork! Damn.

$30,000: If we're lucky enough to receive 300% of our goal, we'll create a podcast companion based on the magazine, exploring the relationship between science and society in greater detail, in the way only audio can. This would launch Lateral into the multimedia sphere, supporting the development of the podcast and radio skills of emerging science communicators, not just their written and artistic abilities. 

Risks? Challenges?

As of the launch of this crowdfunding campaign, we've already planned the first month of articles and much of it is currently being written. There's a clear and on-target web design timeline as well, leading to the launch of Lateral on the 3rd of August. Everyone involved, from our editorial team, to our present and future contributors, to our designers, is super keen about the project and we're all working hard to make the magazine as polished and exciting as possible for you, our audience, to finally read and enjoy. 

Once the magazine has been initially funded, the only significant challenge to the future of Lateral will be maintaining a funding stream without commercial advertising, either through audience support via a platform such as Patreon, and/or ongoing partnerships with likeminded scientific organisations. This campaign gives us the breathing room required to settle on a model that keeps the magazine free to read, but allows us to continue to pay contributors for their time and effort. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't pledge money towards our goal, that's totally fine, we understand. But helping get the word out there about Lateral is, in many ways, more helpful! Tell your friends, family, extremely-casual acquaintances: who knows, you might help them discover a new interest in science.

But most important, really, is to keep your eyes peeled for Lateral's grand launch in August! We've already got great stuff lined up for you to read and we can't wait to share it with you all.
